headline: Rarecells, Inc. Appoints Dr. Rita Shaknovich to Scientific Advisory Board
summary: NEW YORK and PARIS, June 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rarecells, Inc., a leader in liquid biopsy technology, is pleased to announce the appointment of Dr. Rita Shaknovich to its Scientific Advisory Board. Dr. Shaknovich brings over 20 years of leadership experience across private industry and academia. She has a distinguished track record of building high-performing teams, developing innovative diagnostic tests, establishing world-class laboratory environments, and advancing critical research in
